overview: With a Masters degree in Marketing Information Technology from Bentley College; I have spent the last few years as both a real estate rental broker and a web-marketing consultant for some of the most reputable real estate firms in Boston. Developing web marketing packages during the off-season months, and working as a rental agent during the summer rental season in Boston, I have positioned myself as a complete marketing technology services provider that stands by his work. Here, I identify the IT needs of each company and develop customized solutions to fulfill those needs. With results and the highest level of customer satisfaction, I not only implement such improvements that I provide, I work within the company itself to show that they work
